parameter.name: DefaultConnection-Web.config Connection String
parameter.description: DefaultConnection Connection String used in web.config by the application to access the database.
parameter.defaultValue: Data source=.; initial catalog=Sample; Trusted_Connection=yes; MultipleActiveResultSets=true

parameter.name: SampleEntities-Web.config Connection String
parameter.description: SampleEntities Connection String used in web.config by the application to access the database.
